channel.title: Converting to 508?
channel.description:
Okay i have decided to switch to a 508 server thing so i download a source (ZuberZoft 508)that some dude had released in the downloads section, and omg how does it work :confused:? I think i can manage but i have a few questions?
my ocd about organization so its gna be in a list...
Still looking
[ul][li]Where are the most important files?[/li][/ul]
Fixed
[ul][li]idk what replaced the client.java but [/li] [li]Thank You[/li] [li]smart elic... but i get it now[/li] [li]Found and Fixed :)[/li] [li]Found and Fixed :)[/li] [li]AutoSpawn is npcspawn.cfg[/li][/ul]
Finally i've heard that 508 servers are very unstable, if so why is everyone saying they are going to replace the old ones, especially if most everyone i have seen has no idea how they work

item.title: Converting to 508?
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“Tatertot3312, post:1, topic:251465”]Okay i have decided to switch to a 508 server thing so i download a source (ZuberZoft 508)that some dude had released in the downloads section, and omg how does it work ? I think i can manage but i have a few questions?

my ocd about organization so its gna be in a list…

Still looking

[ul][li]Is there a client.java? If so where? If not, what replaced it?[/li]
[li]Important files like NPCHandler where are they at?[/li][/ul]

Fixed

[ul][li]Thank You[/li]
[li]smart elic… but i get it now[/li]
[li]Found and Fixed :)[/li]
[li]Found and Fixed :)[/li]
[li]AutoSpawn is npcspawn.cfg[/li][/ul]

Finally i’ve heard that 508 servers are very unstable, if so why is everyone saying they are going to replace the old ones, especially if most everyone i have seen has no idea how they work[/quote]I already answered all of your questions.

Read full topic

item.title: Converting to 508?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

You can find this all out yourself, just take a look at the individual classes.

Read full topic

item.title: Converting to 508?
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[ul][li]Is there a client.java? If so where? If not, what replaced it?[/li][/ul]

No there isn’t, a bunch of files replaced it.

[ul][li]There’s a bin, build, files, src, and Worlds folder please explain (purpose, content, etc)[/li][/ul]

Bin has the binary, build has the class files, files has the client files, src has the source files.

[ul][li]Important files like NPCHandler, and AutoSpawn where are they at?[/li][/ul]

Figure it out yourself.

[ul][li]There are folders, inside folders, inside folders, inside folders wtf?[/li][/ul]

That’s called packaging.

[ul][li]Where is the run.bat?[/li][/ul]

The bin folder.

[ul][li]Where is the compiler?[/li][/ul]

The bin folder.

Read full topic
